script.title: check-netconf-acl.slax
script.author: rsankar
script.synopsis: This event script enforces a login-based NETCONF access only from an authorized subnet
script.description: This script works for Juniper release 9.5+ This event script is written to restrict the netconf access with a given login from an authorized subnet only. This can be easily extended to multiple authorized subnets, or use 0.0.0.0/32 to deny any access

example.title: Example
example.description: Configuration required for this event script
